name: honorable
description: An extensible React component librarie for 2022 and beyond

scripts.dev: npm run clean:peerDependencies && npm run clean:build && nodemon --watch src --exec "npm run build"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:node-modules && npm i && npm run clean:peerDependencies
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
